metaDescription: Get to know Yoga Stenungsund - your local yoga studio. We offer yoga for all levels in a warm and welcoming environment.
title: About Yoga Stenungsund
subtitle: A place for calm, strength and community

intro.title: Our vision
intro.description: At Yoga Stenungsund, we believe in yoga's power to transform both body and mind. Our studio was founded with the vision of creating a sanctuary from everyday stress - a place where you can find balance, build strength and discover inner peace.

community.title: Community
community.description: We create an inclusive environment where everyone feels welcome and seen

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: Authentic teaching focused on traditional yoga adapted for modern life

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We support your personal journey, wherever you are in your practice

mindfulness.title: Presence
mindfulness.description: Mindful presence in every breath, every movement and every encounter

studio.title: Our studio
studio.description: Located in the heart of Stenungsund, our studio is designed to be an oasis of calm. With natural light, warm colors and carefully selected details, we create an environment that supports your practice.
features: Spacious yoga room with natural light
Changing rooms with showers and storage
Lounge area for relaxation and community
Fully equipped with yoga mats and props

journey.title: Our journey
journey.description: Yoga Stenungsund opened its doors in 2019 with a simple vision: to make yoga accessible to everyone in our community. Since then, we have grown into a thriving community of yoga practitioners from all backgrounds and levels.
milestones: 2019 - Studio opens with 5 classes per week
2020 - Launch online classes during the pandemic

cta.title: Become part of our yoga family
cta.description: Whether you're a beginner or experienced practitioner, there's a place for you with us.
